Radio Toggle Switch on/off

v0.1a

Lights

Implementing this component

The Markup

				
	<form id="toggle-switch-on-off">
		<fieldset class="toggle-container t-white">
			<legend class="radio-toggle-title">Lights</legend>
			<div class="radio-toggle">
				<input class="radio-switch" type="radio" name="switch" id="radio-toggle-switch-off" checked>
				<label class="radio-switch-label" for="radio-toggle-switch-off">Off</label>
				<input class="radio-switch" type="radio" name="switch" id="radio-toggle-switch-on">
				<label class="radio-switch-label" for="radio-toggle-switch-on">On</label>
			</div>
		</fieldset>
	</form>

CSS: Theming

				
	/* Theming */
    .t-white .radio-switch-label {
        color: #000;
    }
     .t-white .radio-switch + label:before {
        background: #fff;
        border: 1px solid #ddd;
    }
    .t-white .radio-switch:nth-of-type(1) + label {
        background: #222;
        color:#fff;
    }
    .t-white .radio-switch:nth-of-type(2) + label {
        background: #eee;
        color: #222;
    }
    /* set keyboard focus for each to be slightly different */

    /* On Button */
    .t-white .radio-switch:focus ~ label:nth-of-type(1) {
        background: #ccc;
        color: #222;
    }
    /* Off Button */
    .t-white .radio-switch:focus ~ label:nth-of-type(2) {
        background: #444;
        color: #fff;
    }

CSS: Component

				
/* Component */
    .radio-toggle {

        display:block;
        height: 3.75em;
        max-width: 6.5em;
        overflow-x: hidden;
        position: relative;
        z-index: 1;
    }
    .radio-toggle:after {
        clear: both;
        content: "";
        display: table;
    }
    .radio-toggle-title ~ .radio-toggle .radio-switch {
        left: -9999px;
        opacity: 0;
        position: absolute;
        visibility: none;
    }

    .radio-switch-label {
        border-radius: 40px;
        cursor: pointer;
        display: block;
        float: left;
        opacity: 0;
        padding: 1em;
        position: absolute;
        transition: opacity 0.2s ease;
        width: 100%;
        -webkit-user-select:none;
        user-select:none;

    }

    /* The circular switch */
    .radio-switch + label:before {
        border-radius: 50%;
        content: "";
        display: block;
        height: 3.3em;
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        transition: transform 0.3s ease-in-out;
        width: 3.3em;
    }

    .radio-switch:nth-of-type(1) + label {
        text-align: right;
    }

    .radio-switch:nth-of-type(1) + label:before {
        left: 0;
        transform: translateX(4em);
    }

    .radio-switch:nth-of-type(2) + label {

        text-align: left;
    }
    .radio-switch:nth-of-type(2) + label:before {
        right: 0;
        transform: translateX(-4em);
    }

    /* our transition for each radio button,
        move the 'switch' left or right, and fade out
        the not currently active button
    */

    .radio-switch + label {
        z-index: 5;
    }
    .radio-switch:checked + label {
        opacity: 1;
        z-index: 1;
    }
    .radio-switch:checked + label:before {
        transform: translateX(0);
    }
